Art Workshops for the Art Exhibition "Friends and More"
31  May,  2024
Organized preparatory art workshops for the "Friends and More" art exhibition, forming friendships between the Citizen Chapter and their friends from Al Rayyan International University College and University Foundation College, sponsored by the Arab Museum of
Modern Art.
